translations: 否认，拒绝；放弃，弃权；拒绝承认

sentences.sentence: We disclaim all liability for these matters.
sentences.translation: 我们拒绝对这些内容负任何责任。

sentences.sentence: I will disclaim any responsibility for your actions.
sentences.translation: 对于你的行为我否认有任何的责任。

sentences.sentence: We disclaim all liability for all materials on your site.
sentences.translation: 我们免除所有责任都在你们工地材料。
